snippet: Can you calculate the average number of college applications sent by students using the online Common Application, if given the number of students who use the system and the total number of applications sent through it this year?
abstract: Can you calculate the average number of college applications sent by students using the online Common Application, if given the number of students who use the system and the total number of applications sent through it this year?
lead_paragraph: Test your math skills with this question created by Scott Matthews at Math for America from the article "Common App 4.0."
